  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.security.authorize used by org.apache.hadoop.ha 
    Class and Description

    PolicyProvider provides the Service definitions to the security Policy in effect for Hadoop.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.security.authorize used by org.apache.hadoop.http 
    Class and Description
    AccessControlList
    Class representing a configured access control list.
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.security.authorize used by org.apache.hadoop.ipc 
    Class and Description
    AuthorizationException
    An exception class for authorization-related issues.
    PolicyProvider
    PolicyProvider provides the Service definitions to the security Policy in effect for Hadoop.
    Service
    An abstract definition of service as related to Service Level Authorization for Hadoop.
    ServiceAuthorizationManager
    An authorization manager which handles service-level authorization for incoming service requests.

  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.security.authorize used by org.apache.hadoop.security.protocolPB
